attributes.action: Stop Commons bars from serving alcohol on the day MPs vote.
attributes.additional_details:
We have seen instances where MPs appear to be incoherent and floundering.
If they cannot drive when drunk, why should they decide OUR futures in the same state.
attributes.background:
MPs are supposed to be working for the good of the UK, and need to have their wits about them.
It is difficult for them to be fully coherent if they have consumed large quantities of alcohol. 
The Commons bars should therefore be banned from serving alcohol before EVERY vote, on that same day.
